message.content: No, the authors do not describe any potential participant risks or provide links to Institutional Review Board (IRB) approvals in the provided sections. They mention recruiting participants from Amazon Mechanical Turk and conducting psychophysics experiments, but do not discuss risks or IRB approvals specifically.
